Classification strength indices.

Source: R/threshold.R
threshold.Rd

Classification strength indices.

Usage

threshold(m)

Arguments

m

an object of class "clubprofit" produced by club()

Value

an object of class clubprothreshold

Details

Returns a vector containing the classification strength index for each observation.

Examples

mod <- club(width ~ location, data = jellyfish)
threshold(mod)
#>     obs      PCC
#> 1   6.0 54.34783
#> 2   6.5 58.69565
#> 3   7.0 65.21739
#> 4   8.0 73.91304
#> 5   9.0 76.08696
#> 6  10.0 78.26087
#> 7  11.0 84.78261
#> 8  12.0 84.78261
#> 9  13.0 84.78261
#> 10 14.0 82.60870
#> 11 15.0 76.08696
#> 12 16.0 67.39130
#> 13 16.5 65.21739
#> 14 17.0 63.04348
#> 15 18.0 56.52174
#> 16 19.0 52.17391
#> 17 20.0 50.00000
